readable.title: 2537119659_fa01dd5de5
readable.content: A girl drives a toy truck while a young boy plays behind her A little boy chases a little girl who is driving a red toy jeep . A little girl rides a toy car while her brother walks behind . A little girl with black sunglasses drives a 4x4 red Jeep while a little boy stands in the background dressed in blue . A young boy in blue is chasing a young girl sitting in a play car .
